addNewSubdomainHint: Adds a new subdomain at the end of the list
addSubdomainBeforeHint: Add new subdomain before this subdomain
addedSubdomainSuccessfullyDescription: New Subdomain {{subdomain}} successfully added to domain {{domain}}
aliasCompliesStandard: This content complies with SRC44 standard
aliasFAQFifthAnswer: When someone types your alias into any of our supporting wallets, the wallet looks up that Alias on the blockchain, finds the appropriate address, and sends the crypto to the address associated with that alias.
aliasFAQFifthQuestion: How do payments work with my account aliases?
aliasFAQFirstAnswer: Easy to use and customization are at the core of Signum. Compared to Bitcoin for example, Signum addresses are generally shorter and easier to read. To make this process even simpler, the Signum team developed an alias system to give every Signum address or customized data set a human-friendly and unique phrase.
aliasFAQFourthAnswer:
Yes. Aliases that are registered to your Signum address can be transferred to another Signum address, or can be offered for sale. You can also change the type of your Alias. All these actions are built-in functions on the Signum blockchain.
Signum Aliases are a new kind of tradable asset.
aliasFAQFourthQuestion: Will i be able to transfer or sell my alias?
aliasFAQSecondAnswer: To check if an Alias name is available, just type it in an Alias Marketplace search bar and we'll tell you immediately if someone else already owns it.
aliasFAQSecondQuestion: How do I check if an Alias is available?
aliasFAQSixthAnswer: Yes, you can update the addresses or other content pointed to by your Alias at any time.
aliasFAQSixthQuestion: Can I change the address my Alias points to after I've bought it?
aliasFAQThirdAnswer: Think about what business name or specialty you'd like for your Alias. Type the alias you want into the Alias Marketplace Search Bar. We'll tell you if that particular Alias is available.
aliasHasNoContent: This Alias does not have content assigned
aliasInfoHint: The total number of Signum Aliases you own.
aliasLandingTopSectionDescription: Type your desired name and check if it's still available. Claim your

aliasLandingTopSectionTitle2: Register your very own name now!
aliasUpdateSuccesfullDescription: Your alias update is getting processed. Wait for confirmation and let the blockchain do everything for you ðŸ˜€
cannotConvertToSubdomainSummary: The selected domain cannot be converted to a subdomain. There are no parent domains available.
clearLocalDataWizardDescription:
This means that any cached data on this page will be deleted, your preferences will be reset and your account will be logged out. 
You can think of this action as a cleanup!
clearLocalDataWizardTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your local data?
clickToCopyToClipboard: Click to copy text to clipboard
convertToSubdomainDescription: Select a domain to which the intended subdomain should be associated.
convertToSubdomainHint: Convert this domain to a subdomain
convertToSubdomainSummary: Now, that you selected a domain, you need to convert it to a subdomain. The selected domain will be appended to the domains subdomain list.
deleteDomainHint: Immediately cancels subscription and releases the Alias
deleteSubdomainHint: Immediately cancels subscription and releases the Alias
doYouWantToDeleteDomain: Do you really want to get rid of this domain?
doYouWantToDeleteDomainDescription: Once you continue, the underlying alias '{{aliasName}}' will not belong to your account anymore and can be claimed by others.
doYouWantToDeleteSubdomain: Do you really want to get rid of this subdomain?
domainInfoHint: Domains and Subdomains owned by you.
errorLoadingDomain: Could not load the domain {{domain}} - Detail: {{error}}
linkageSummary: Now, the new subdomain needs to be linked into the domain list. Just one more confirmation and your new subdomain will be available on next block (about 4 minutes). All decentralized!
maintenanceModeDescription: Hold on! We will be ready very soon!
maintenanceModeTitle: We are currently refueling the rocket that will take us to the moon.
name: Name
notFoundPage: We could not find the page you were looking for.
openInBrowserHint: Opens '{{domain}}' in the browser- works only with the XT wallet installed
processingHint: This item is being processed by the network
releaseSubdomainSuccessfulDescription: The subdomain has been released successfully, i.e. the subscription was cancelled and the alias is no longer owned by you. This will take effect on next block
relinkageSummary: With the removal of the subdomain it's necessary to relink the subdomain list. Just one more confirmation and the operation is complete.
searchAliasPlaceHolder: Type to search a domain you own
searchSubdomainsPlaceholder: Type to search in your subdomains...
sendToAccountHint: Send SIGNA to Account using XT wallet
seoTitle: Signum Name System - Your very own names for your Accounts and URLs in Signum and elsewhere!
signTransactionDescription: We need this signature to verify that you are the owner of this Signum account.
signTransactionSecondDescription: We will never own your private keys and cannot access your funds without your confirmation.
signTransactionTitle:
Please sign the transaction in
your wallet to continue
subdomainInvalidDescription: The content for the subdomain is invalid and cannot be saved. Please review the content and correct the errors.
subdomainNameFieldHelper: Maximum 24 alphanumeric characters and unicodes, no whitespaces
subdomainNonSrc44Warning: By updating this subdomain the previous content will be entirely overwritten!
subscriptionInfoHint: Each alias requires a subscription of 12.5 SIGNA per quarter. The stats are only estimates with upper limits as legacy aliases are not accounted.
topSectionDescription: Use your Signum Aliases to resolve your very custom URLs in the browser and account addresses in the wallets
tryTheXtWalletDescription: Install the wallet and then sign in or create a new account in order to use Signum DApps with one click
tryTheXtWalletHint: If you have installed the XT wallet, check in the settings, if DApps interaction is allowed.
unlinkDomainDescription: This action removes '{{domain}}' from its list of subdomains. It's similar to taking the first card from a pile and setting it aside. You still own the Alias(es)/Domain(s) and can use it normally.
unlinkDomainHint: Removes this Alias from the head of the subdomain list. You still own the Alias
unlinkSubdomainHint: Removes the Alias from the subdomain list, but you still own the Alias
urlFieldHelper: Must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS web link
whatYouCanDoWithSubdomainSummary:
You can use this subdomain to resolve to the related URL in the browser (requires XT Wallet installed) and as human friendly name for recipient addresses.
Yes, this is is awesome!
xtWalletChooseAnotherNetwork: Please, select a node in the XT wallet of the correct network, and retry connection.
xtWalletInvalidNetworkDialogHint: XT Wallet was successfully detected, but the currently selected network in the wallet does not match the required network.
xtWalletNetworkChangedWarning: You just selected a host from another network in your wallet.
xtWalletPermissionAccountRemovedWarning: You just removed the connected account or permission in your wallet.
xtWalletRequiredNetwork: This DApp requires the following network
xtWalletSecondBenefit: Your private key will be stored locally in your browser
